author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Monday announced a solatium of Rs. Three lakh to each of the families of 11 police personnel, who died of illness.

In a statement, Ms. Jayalalithaa condoled their death and said that the solatium would be granted from the Chief Minister’s Public Relief Fund. The 11 police personnel had died in separate incidents during the floods last year.
title: Solatium announced
